definition: to be wise (in mind, word or act)
kjvTranslation: [idiom] exceeding, teach wisdom, be (make self, shew self) wise, deal (never so) wisely, make wiser.

translations.bg: да бъдеш мъдър (в мислите, думите или действията си)
translations.cs: být moudrý (v myšlení, slovech nebo činech)
translations.da: at være klog (i sind, ord eller handling)
translations.de: weise sein (in Gedanken, Worten oder Taten)
translations.el: να είσαι σοφός (στο μυαλό, στο λόγο ή στην πράξη)
translations.es: ser sabio (en mente, palabra o acto)
translations.fr: être sage (en pensée, en parole ou en action)
translations.id: menjadi bijaksana (dalam pikiran, perkataan, atau tindakan)
translations.it: essere saggio (nella mente, nella parola o nell'azione)
translations.nb: å være klok (i sinn, ord eller handling)
translations.nl: wijs zijn (in geest, woord of daad)
translations.pl: być mądrym (w myślach, słowach lub czynach)
translations.pt: ser sábio (em mente, palavra ou ato)
translations.ro: a fi înțelept (în gândire, cuvânt sau acțiune)
translations.ru: быть мудрым (в мыслях, словах или поступках)
translations.sk: byť múdry (v mysli, slove alebo čine)
translations.sl: biti moder (v mislih, besedah ali dejanjih)
translations.sv: att vara klok (i tanke, ord eller handling)
